title: ‘Rethinking’ the Domestic Development Pathway with Alexey Vermeulen’s Phase II Project
content:
The off-road privateer is using his experience and connections to lay the groundwork for up-and-coming pros.

Read the full article at ‘Rethinking’ the Domestic Development Pathway with Alexey Vermeulen’s Phase II Project on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
